import React from 'react'; import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import './checkout.styles.scss' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item' import { selectCartItems, selectCartItemsTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' const CheckoutPage = ({ cartItems, total }) => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => ( )) }
Total: ${total}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartItemsTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage);
